content:
Hi, I‚Äôm thePlant üå±#Just Kidding, I‚Äôm not actually a plant.
I‚Äôm a human who loves sunlight, growth, and taking things slow, so I go by thePlant.
Why theSisyphean?#I often use the alias theSisyphean because, from a stranger‚Äôs perspective, I seem to do a lot of meaningless things.
Camus‚Äô Sisyphus isn‚Äôt tragic. He knows his task has no final meaning, no payoff and he continues anyway.
The meaning isn‚Äôt in reaching the top. It‚Äôs in choosing the climb, fully aware of its pointlessness. Whether it contributes anything doesn‚Äôt matter. There‚Äôs no obligation for this to be useful, efficient, or impressive. What matters is that the struggle is conscious.
That it‚Äôs chosen. That it‚Äôs mine.
‚ÄúThe struggle itself is enough to fill a man‚Äôs heart. One must imagine Sisyphus happy.‚Äù
So yeah, the name stuck.
(I also thank a friend for introducing me to this quote.)
What is this website?#This site is a collection of thoughts, experiments, projects, and things I felt like doing, not because they‚Äôre useful, but because they felt worth doing.
You may or may not gain anything from it.
But if something resonates, that‚Äôs more than enough.
